summary: This is a Retexture of MadCat221's Dawnguard Arsenal Swords With added Pulsing Glow Effect
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=4][u][b][size=4][font=Arial] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[img width=104,height=24]https://i.imgur.com/Z1Nit5q.png[/img][/font][/size][/b][/u] [size=5] ﻿Details[/size][/size][/b][/u] ﻿ ﻿[u][b][size=4][font=Arial][img width=105,height=25]https://i.imgur.com/Z1Nit5q.png[/img][/font][/size][/b][/u]

[center]This is a Retexture of [color=#00ff00]MadCat221[/color]'s Swords from his [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72910/]Dawnguard Arsenal
[/url]﻿
Both the Greatsword and the One Handed Versions were edited.
New Textures and a Pulsing Glow Effect has been Added.

The [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92395]Dawnguard Battle Axe [/url]﻿was also Retextured


[img width=78,height=78]https://i.imgur.com/hbNuhhl.png[/img][/center]
author: Behringer911
